name: BLOCK-T615
configuration_schema:
$schema: http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#
title: BLOCK-T615 configuration
description: Configuration for BLOCK-T615.
type: object
properties:
  maxiter:
    description: Number of iterations for the closed-loop
    type: number
    default: 5
  elevation:
    description: Elevation angle in degrees
    type: number
    default: 70
  azimuth:
    description: Azimuth angle in degrees
    type: number
    default: 70
  rotation_angle:
    description: Rotation angle in degrees
    type: number
    default: 0
  mode:
    description: Mode to use for the script.
    type: string
    default: "FAM"
  block_note:
    description: A note about the block
    type: string
    default: "closed_loop_22dof_trunc12_fam"
  truncation:
    description: Truncation index to use for the estimating the state
    type: number
    default: 12
